price: E, com efeito, sabemos dos antecessores de vós e, com efeito, sabemos dos sucessores.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا ٱلۡمُسۡتَقۡدِمِينَ مِنكُمۡ وَلَقَدۡ عَلِمۡنَا ٱلۡمُسۡتَـٔۡخِرِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ʿalim'nā al-mus'taqdimīna minkum walaqad ʿalim'nā al-mus'takhirīna
